data.text: @sachinbaweja We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@sachinbaweja Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@CryptoHodl30 Our officer will reply back soon.
@marudi_3ice Greetings. We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@georgywalks Greetings. We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@yogesh_gola12 Please be aware that the refund processing time depends on the process of the bank but currently is 90 days.
@s_tichai787 ทีมงานขอขอบพระคุณสำหรับกำลังใจค่ะ แล้วพบกันนะคะ💜

@saradomeij Due to the high volume of requests, we are receiving via email response to yours may take some time. We're sorry for the inconvenience. If there're any updates, our staff will contact you as soon as possible.

@xo__anna We do apologize for the inconvenience. As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. Our staff will respond to you according to the queue as soon as possible.

@HenriHuynh2 @ThaiAirwaysID We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@cayatinjain THAI temporarily suspended its operations from 1 April-31 May 2020. For further information please visit https://t.co/laQn5jk0s4.

@TicianaGTY @lusianaherawan We do apologize for the inconvenience. As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. Our staff will respond to you according to the queue as soon as possible.
@Sivared08505150 We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.
@oohriza Yes, if there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@oohriza In this case, we suggest that you can fill out the form on our website. And waiting for a response from our staff via email.

@Sivared08505150 If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@NatalieBrowne15 We recommend that you contact our Customer Relations Department at customer@thaiairways.com
@oohriza Did you contact your agency about this issue?
@NatalieBrowne15 We recommend that you contact our Customer Relations Department at customer@thaiairways.com
@RahulK1978 We suggest you send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@vinawowo We're sorry for the inconvenience. In this case, we suggest you send email to contact@service.thaiairways.com for further assistance.
@Ashu08970397 Greetings, we would like to inform you that canceled flights have not have been officially scheduled. If there are changes, we will announce that as soon as possible.

@vinawowo Greetings, due to high request, the refund process may take longer than usual. We suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in Seoul at tel: 82-32-7443571-74 and 82-23-707-0114 or email: icnkk@thaiairways.com for more information.

@Sunlaughmoutain Hello. If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. However, If you booked directly with us We suggest you get the link  https://t.co/K1RvRpHouj to request a travel voucher or extend ticket validity to your ticket.
Behind the scenes of #ThaiAirways painting the Suphannahong Royal Barge aircraft livery on its B777-300, royally bestowed the name “Lahan Sai”. https://t.co/x6OhcVksHG
@Stefan_baisden We do apologize for the inconvenience.  It may take a while for our officers to get back to you.
@oohriza You are most welcome.
@HenriHuynh2 If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
Today (6 April) is Chakri Day. Learn more 👉🏻 https://t.co/pRdnXTJOhY https://t.co/c6TRbl9WTB
@azneyzaa Greetings, our officer will reply back to you soon.
@KatdareAshish Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. (2/2)
@KatdareAshish In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. (1/2)
@HenriHuynh2 We suggest that you can send to this one, e-mail jkt.reservation@thaiairways.com for further assistance.
@HenriHuynh2 May we inquire which e-mail you have sent to?

@TicianaGTY @lusianaherawan Greetings, we do apologize for the inconvenience. We suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR in order to give you for further information.

@jellynw สวัสดีค่ะ สำหรับในกรณีดังกล่าวท่านผู้โดยสารสามารถตรวจสอบข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่  THAI Contact Center 02-356-1111 หลังระบบอัตโนมัติกดเมนูลัด 12 สำหรับเที่ยวบินภายในประเทศ ได้ตลอด 24 ชั่วโมงค่ะ หรือติดต่อผ่านช่องทางอีเมลได้ที่  contact@service.thaiairways.com ค่ะ
@Cilla_Hartill Greetings, we suggest that you can visit to reserve Preferred Seats via link https://t.co/gzI8PB0KYo

urls.description: Thai Airways has service to 35 countries and offers online flight booking to popular domestic Thailand and International destinations.

data.text: @DrTomNorris1 @jgupit We would like to inform that you can visit on our website, https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q for more information or contact our THAI local offices near you for more information.
@Wolverine271 Greetings, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We suggest that you contact e-mail hanha@thaiairways.com.vn , hanht@thaiairways.com.vn for further assistance.
@NatalieBrowne15 We are sorry for the inconvenience. We suggest that you try again with another device.
@NatalieBrowne15 May we ask which device you use to access the URL?
@NatalieBrowne15 Could you please provide us the link that doesn't work?

@NatalieBrowne15 In the case of a flight delay, we recommend that you contact our Customer Relations Department at customer@thaiairways.com for issuing a confirmation letter regarding the canceled flight.
@save289401024 ทีมงานขอทราบหมายเลขการจองเพื่อตรวจสอบให้นะคะ

@xo__anna We suggest that you contact our THAI office for the information on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@DrTomNorris1 @jgupit We are sorry for the late response. As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@bhaktibhikne Greetings, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency for further assistance.
@suki_dosanjh27 We are sorry for the late response. As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@xo__anna It would be alright if your ticket is refundable.
@xo__anna They will reply back soon, Anna
@xo__anna We suggest that you send your information to one e-mail: reservations@thaiairways.co.uk for further assistance.
@xo__anna May we ask the e-mail address of ours that you have sent to?
@Aalimnazier What would you mean?

@HenriHuynh2 We do apologize for the inconvenience. As there are many people contacting our office, please wait for the reply from our related department after they have done the process of investigation, they will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.

@vleminckx_tom Hello. We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure to change the time or date of flight at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@bubuxious We are sorry for the inconvenience. As soon as there is an update, our staff will get back to you.
@MichaelllPW ทีมงานต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกเป็นอย่างสูงมา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ

@KatdareAshish Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Alexgt3379 Greetings. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@HenriHuynh2 If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@leahhjay_ If you would like to refund please contact our THAI office in your city of departure. Click https://t.co/LbZtOVcPNV

data.text:
@_cyrusmg If you booked directly with https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q we suggest you contact net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or our office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR and provide these information:
1. Full Name (ENG)
2. Booking Number
3. Traveling Date
4. Detail of your issue
@HenriHuynh2 Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

@HenriHuynh2 We do apologize for the inconvenience. As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. After they have done the process of investigation, they will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.
@tamaragss We regret to inform you that there are no flights allowed to enter Thailand during 4-6 April 2020.
@tamaragss @traveloka We suggest that you contact the agency directly.
@tamaragss We have temporarily canceled flights, visit https://t.co/N7MclLSc1T for more information.

@tamaragss we are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@tamaragss The booking that is made by the travel agency, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@tamaragss In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@tamaragss Greetings, could you please repeat your statement in English?
@psjps ทีมงานขอเรียนแจ้งว่าสำหรับการติดต่อผ่านช่องทางอีเมล เจ้าหน้าที่จะต้องใช้เวลาในการดำเนินการตอบกลับตามลำดับนะคะ ทีมงานแนะนำให้ท่านรอการดำเนินการจากเจ้าหน้าที่ค่ะ
@oohriza We would like to inform you that only waiting a confirm email from us.
@berndlehmann15 We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@spangger Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@berndlehmann15 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@laurieco01 We suggest that you contact our Reservation & Ticketing via the number (84-24) 3826-7921/22 ext. 0, 211 or e-mail  hanha@thaiairways.com.vn , hanht@thaiairways.com.vn for further information.
@ASarjam We suggest that you contact our THAI local offices near you for more information. You may find contact details at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@ASarjam Greetings, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency to assist you in this case.
@oohriza Yes, now we have promotion Extend Ticket Validity policy, for more information click  https://t.co/jT1qSOSca4 .
